plot: A short documentary film exploring the private thoughts and interior lives of a pregnant City Lady and a Tibetan Buddhist Masseur as she is given a massage at 'Sen' in the city of London.
title: A Short Film About Massage
plot_es: A short documentary film exploring the private thoughts and interior lives of a pregnant City Lady and a Tibetan Buddhist Masseur as she is given a massage at 'Sen' in the city of London.
plot_en: A short documentary film exploring the private thoughts and interior lives of a pregnant City Lady and a Tibetan Buddhist Masseur as she is given a massage at 'Sen' in the city of London.
